biotools.summary: Takes a list of gene identifiers (such as RefSeq and Unigene IDs), consensus patterns, and (optionally) a position weight matrix as input and returns a list of matches for the patterns in both the sense and anti-sense strands of the relevant genomic sequence.  The user specifies what distance up and downstream from both the transcription start site and the 3' terminus to look for the patterns.

bioschemas.name: BEARR
bioschemas.summary: Takes a list of gene identifiers (such as RefSeq and Unigene IDs), consensus patterns, and (optionally) a position weight matrix as input and returns a list of matches for the patterns in both the sense and anti-sense strands of the relevant genomic sequence.  The user specifies what distance up and downstream from both the transcription start site and the 3' terminus to look for the patterns.
